Unable to apply lemma of type "forall n : nat, incl (UExp F R n) (UExp G R n)" on hypothesis of type "incl (comp (star B) (UExp G R' n)) (UExp G R' (S n))".

ctx: remember (UExp G R n) as Un.

ctx: remember (UExp G R n) as Un.
exceptions.exn: In environment A, X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y B : relation X F, G : function X Y HBF : transparent B F HFG : contains F G HBG : contains (chaining_l (star B)) G R : relation2 X Y HRt : evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) (F R)) HRa : evolve_a TX TY R (G R) n : nat x : X pre_silent : forall (x' : X) (y : Y), TX (T A) x x' -> UExp F R n x y -> exists2 y' : Y, star (TY (T A)) y y' & comp (star B) (union2 (UExp F R n) (F (UExp F R n))) x' y' silent : simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) (UIter F R)) HFGn : forall n : nat, incl (UExp F R n) (UExp G R n) R' : relation2 X Y IHn : incl (comp (star B) (UExp G R' n)) (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n))) H : Y x0 : X H1 : star B x x0 H2 : union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n)) x0 H wmon_m : increasing G wmon_t : forall R : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY (G R) wmon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_m : increasing F mon_t : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S) mon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) ctrl_t : forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) R) ctrl_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S) Unable to unify "evolve_a TX TY R (G R)" with "union2 (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n))) (G (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n)))) x H".

exceptions.exn: In environment A, X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y B : relation X F, G : function X Y HBF : transparent B F HFG : contains F G HBG : contains (chaining_l (star B)) G R : relation2 X Y HRt : evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) (F R)) HRa : evolve_a TX TY R (G R) n : nat x : X pre_silent : forall (x' : X) (y : Y), TX (T A) x x' -> UExp F R n x y -> exists2 y' : Y, star (TY (T A)) y y' & comp (star B) (union2 (UExp F R n) (F (UExp F R n))) x' y' silent : simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) (UIter F R)) HFGn : forall n : nat, incl (UExp F R n) (UExp G R n) R' : relation2 X Y IHn : incl (comp (star B) (UExp G R' n)) (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n))) H : Y x0 : X H1 : star B x x0 H2 : union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n)) x0 H wmon_m : increasing G wmon_t : forall R : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY (G R) wmon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_m : increasing F mon_t : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S) mon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) ctrl_t : forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) R) ctrl_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S) Unable to unify "exists2 y' : Y, star (TY (T A)) ?M6801 y' & comp (star B) (union2 (UExp F R n) (F (UExp F R n))) ?M6800 y'" with "union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n)) x H \\/ G (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n))) x H".

ctx: remember (UExp G R n) as Un.
exceptions.exn: In environment A, X, Y : Type TX : reduction_t A X TY : reduction_t A Y B : relation X F, G : function X Y HBF : transparent B F HFG : contains F G HBG : contains (chaining_l (star B)) G R : relation2 X Y HRt : evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) (F R)) HRa : evolve_a TX TY R (G R) n : nat x : X pre_silent : forall (x' : X) (y : Y), TX (T A) x x' -> UExp F R n x y -> exists2 y' : Y, star (TY (T A)) y y' & comp (star B) (union2 (UExp F R n) (F (UExp F R n))) x' y' silent : simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) (UIter F R)) HFGn : forall n : nat, incl (UExp F R n) (UExp G R n) R' : relation2 X Y IHn : incl (comp (star B) (UExp G R' n)) (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n))) H : Y x0 : X H1 : star B x x0 H2 : union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n)) x0 H wmon_m : increasing G wmon_t : forall R : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY (G R) wmon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, simulation_t TX TY R -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (G R) (G S) mon_m : increasing F mon_t : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_t TX TY (F R) (F S) mon_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (F R) (F S) ctrl_t : forall R : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY (comp (star B) R) ctrl_a : forall R S : relation2 X Y, evolve_t TX TY R (comp (star B) R) -> simulation_t TX TY S -> evolve_a TX TY R S -> incl R S -> evolve_a TX TY (comp (star B) R) (comp (star B) S) Unable to unify "incl (comp (star B) (UExp G R' n)) (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n)))" with "union2 (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n))) (G (union2 (UExp G R' n) (G (UExp G R' n)))) x H".

original: intros R n. induction n. - simpl. apply incl_refl. - intros x H. apply HFGn in IHn. specialize (pre_silent n). remember (UExp G R n) as Un. remember (comp (star B) Un) as compBUn. specialize (pre_silent x). rewrite <- HeqcompBUn in pre_silent. rewrite <- HeqUn in IHn at 2. eapply HRa. + apply pre_silent. + apply IHn.
